knimeNode.name: Download database
knimeNode.shortDescription: Permits downloading of Mascot databases (FASTA files)

fullDescription.intro: Downloads the chosen Mascot database (FASTA files) using MascotEE. Useful for obtaining or computing decoy sequences for estimation of false-discovery rate.
fullDescription.option: The default is currently valid for plantcell.unimelb.edu.au users, however any url may be entered here where MascotEE has been installed.
Enter the database you would like to load
